channel.title: Tribal Spirit Shield
channel.description:
This was a quick Shield made with spirit shield model made by jagex and my tribal model. [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29pw6pw.png[/img]
in-game looks a bit messed up :S [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/24fhen5.png[/img]
Credits: Jagex for the Spirit shield %99.9999998 Me for adding a small change %00.0000002 :p

item.title: Tribal Spirit Shield
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:22, topic:373356”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=469373.msg3433047#msg3433047 date=1292525531]

It’s like football. You can say the Vikings suck all you want, and talk about stupid moves they do, but you probably couldn’t do better.

When the ball is snapped, it’s really not that hard to catch it.
[/quote]

You totally missed his point. What he is saying is that you don’t have to be good at something to critique someone. I can say that the Colt’s defense is doing terrible and that they should go with a 5 3 defense instead of a 4 - 4 because their running defense is terrible, but I could not be a coach of the Colt’s no matter what. I am under qualified. You can hold your own opinions and people will listen to them by how respected you are.[/quote]
fixed. But yeah, this is what I meant.

Read full topic

item.title: Tribal Spirit Shield
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:20, topic:373356”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=469373.msg3432558#msg3432558 date=1292470104]
It’s like football. You can say the Vikings suck all you want, and talk about stupid moves they do, but you probably couldn’t do better.
[/quote]

When the ball is snapped, it’s really not that hard to catch it.[/quote]
You totally missed his point. What he is saying is that you don’t have to be good at something to critique someone. I can say that the Colt’s defense is doing terrible and that they should go with a 5 3 defense instead of a 4 - 4 because their running defense is terrible, but I could not be a coach of the Colt’s no matter what. I am under qualified. You can hold your own opinions and people will listen to them by how respected you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Tribal Spirit Shield
item.dc:creator: @zackasmacka zackasmacka
item.description:
@zackasmacka wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:14, topic:373356”][quote author=deans1243 link=topic=469373.msg3432515#msg3432515 date=1292467995]
Well actually you did use some sort of trible thing, bu ti just don’t like that one haha, i don’t like the dragon either. It just seems like there is to much stuff on the shield, and that sigil is kind of obnoxious, but i cant even trace a model or even make a prim sword lol so i may not know what im talking about
[/quote]
Thank you wanderer, if you guys want to watch a glock model i made with blender go ahead it was a result from a tutorial, model was %100 by me created
How can you say that? Your opinion on what a model looks like is totally opinionated. It doesn’t matter by experience or anything. All you have to be is a good art critique. Critiquing someones work isn’t about how good you are, but how respected your opinions are.[/quote]

Read full topic
